original_text: The armed men were walking before the priests who were blowing the trumpets, and the rear guard was walking after the ark, while the trumpets blew continually.
korean_text: 그 무장한 자들은 나팔 부는 제사장들 앞에서 행진하며 후군은 궤 뒤를 따르고 제사장들은 나팔을 불며 행진하더라

sentences.original_text: The armed men were walking before the priests
sentences.korean_translation: 무장한 자들이 제사장들의 앞에서 행진하고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: and the rear guard was walking after the ark
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 후위대는 언약궤 뒤에서 따르고 있었습니다.
